name: Lethal Life Flow
desc: 1.1x + 0.1x all stats (except Con & Mov) for every Magic unit in a 2 tile radius. When 0 Magic units near the user, the user consumes 2 more Fatigue per attack. Magic units within 2 tiles suffer 2 Fatigue every time the user enters combat. When > Max Fatigue, become Petrified.
components: (min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['STR']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['MAG']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['SKL']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['SPD']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['DEF']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['RES']
(min(1.5, 1.0 + (len([x for x in get_units_within_distance(unit.position, dist=2) if 'Magic' in x.tags])*0.1)) - 1)*unit.stats['LCK']
